alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Roosevelt County; Southwest Chaves County; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 17 at 3:15AM MDT until July 18 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 107 expected. * WHERE...Upper Tularosa Valley, Curry County, Guadalupe County, Roosevelt County, Eastern San Miguel County, Harding County, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From Noon to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Roosevelt County; Southwest Chaves County; Upper Tularosa Valley
